main event: An elderly woman observed a white oval object in New York, N.Y. that displayed no motion or change in appearance for 2 to 3 minutes in March 1955.
interesting points: The object was seen stationary without directional movement., The same or a similar object was reported on a separate occasion., A different sighting in the area described peculiar objects hanging motionless with intermittent flashes of light., Multiple witnesses independently reported seeing bright lights in the sky over New York., No photographs were available for any of the sightings, only sketches and documents.
sighted object: a white oval object and peculiar objects hanging in the air
